paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

functional_data.summary: The study indicates that various mutations in the TTR gene lead to symptomatic and asymptomatic presentations.

variants.segregation_data: The variants segregate with disease in families as indicated by familial history and genotyping.
variants.additional_notes: The study mentions multiple mutations in the TTR gene but does not provide specific cDNA or protein notations.
key_quotes: The ATTRv-CM group consists of patients with mutations at Val30Met (n = 18), Val20Ile (n = 11), Ile107Val (n = 5), Leu58His (n = 6), Cys10Arg (n = 4), Val122Ile (n = 3), Ala45Thr (n = 1), Ile84Asn (n = 1), Ile107Phe (n = 1), Arg34Gly (n = 1), Thr126Arg (n = 1).
Furthermore, the asymptomatic mutation carriers were Val20Ile (n = 5), Val30Met (n = 6), Val122Ile (n = 1), Cys10Arg (n = 1), Ile107Val (n = 1), Ile84Thr (n = 1).

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variants were clearly mentioned in the results.
